title: Noam Chomsky - Taking Control of Our Lives - Audio only
description:
2000 - 02 - 26 - Santa Fe, New Mexico, USA

Noam Chomsky - Taking Control of Our Lives - Freedom, Sovereignty, and Other Endangered Species

Chomsky is a member of the Interhemispheric Resource Center's Board of Directors. Here, he marks the IRC's 20th anniversary by speaking about economic and political globalization.
Text of talk: http://www.ratical.org/co-globalize/NC022600.txt

Noam Chomsky Audio Conservatory
